document.full_text: singer and songwriter neil diamond was inducted into the rock and roll hall of fame on monday, crooning his signature mellow rock songs in a stark contrast to fellow inductee heavy metal band alice cooper.
document.title: rock hall inducts neil diamond, alice cooper
lines_and_colors: singer and songwriter neil diamond was inducted into the rock and roll hall of fame on monday, crooning his signature mellow rock songs in a stark contrast to fellow inductee heavy metal band alice cooper.
